tasks.label: make
args: spack env activate aperi-mech && ./do_configure && cd ../aperi-mech_build && make

tasks.label: make_gpu
args: spack env activate aperi-mech-gpu && ./do_configure --gpu && cd ../aperi-mech_build_gpu && make

tasks.label: make_debug
args: spack env activate aperi-mech && ./do_configure --build-type Debug && cd ../aperi-mech_build && make

tasks.label: make_debug_gpu
args: spack env activate aperi-mech-gpu && ./do_configure --build-type Debug --gpu && cd ../aperi-mech_build_gpu && make

tasks.label: make_relwithdebinfo
args: spack env activate aperi-mech && ./do_configure --build-type RelWithDebInfo && cd ../aperi-mech_build && make

tasks.label: make_coverage
args: spack env activate aperi-mech && ./do_configure --code-coverage && cd ../aperi-mech_build && make coverage
